item.title: Impact of the Availability of ChatGPT on Software Development Activity
item.description: Advancements in Artificial Intelligence, especially with ChatGPT, have greatly influenced software development. Leveraging novel data from GitHub Innovation Graph, the World Bankâ€™s Data Lab hypothesized that ChatGPT improves the efficiency of software production.
